title: The efficacy of telemedicine using videoconferencing system in outpatient care for cancer patients: a systematic review and meta-analysis protocol
title_html: The efficacy of telemedicine using videoconferencing system in outpatient care for cancer patients: a systematic review and meta-analysis protocol

description: Further research is needed to compare the impact of interactive Telemedicine using videoconferencing systems with usual face-to-face care in the outpatient with cancer. The aim of this study is to review systematically the efficacy of interactive telemedicine using videoconferencing systems in this setting, including feasibility, satisfaction and cost.
